reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Support technical education in rural Peru across Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (STEM) education

description.narrative: To increase demand in technological careers in Lima and Ica regions in Peru by delivering innovative and inspirational technology training based on STEM Education Programme to poorest and rural zones high school's students via the design, delivery and management of a mobile laboratory, based on UK expertise and promoting UK best practice.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
